reviewText: I've always found Chuck's movies enjoyable. Nothing approaching high art, but enjoyable. These are the blu-ray versions, and as such I look for high quality. What I found in this case was graininess and mono soundtracks. For when these were filmed, I guess I can't expect much more. So, I give them a passable rating.
What is there not to like about Chuck Norris? The movies brought back old memories and the HD was superb . Loved it very much and the price was right .

Like i said before wish  we could get free shipping to Canada. The price was a lot cheaper buying from you than i could have bought single. Than in some cases on some movies i bought i had to pay import tax on some i was refunded.

It is good to see Chuck Norris movies on bluray
Heaps better than my old VHS tapes.
Hope there is more to come
Great Collection but missing "Missing In Action III"  All good movies and good production quality for the Blu-rays, but kind of sparse on Special Features.
Love Chuck Norris, had all the DVD's, just upgraded to Blu-Ray.  I don't know why he doesn't do more films.
Not the greatest acting but Chuck Norris's martial arts is one of the best and I'm a sucker for bringing home the good guys!

My --- back-in-the-day --- Chuck Norris movies are all on VHS-video-cassette-tapes and those old 12" [long-play record lookin'] LASER-videodiscs. Just MAY buy these bargain-bin priced classics before some-one changes their mind --- ME! This "bundle" is like buying two(2) of the movies at their regular price, and getting three (3) f-r-e-e! All the Chuck Norris classics are here --- except for Missing in Action III, which isn't available on a Blu-Ray Disc. Unfortunately, only one of these five (5) movies (The Delta Force [Blu-ray]) is in =<=S-T-E-R-E-O=> sound. Pick this bundle up! Another bundle-deal - - right now --- for about the same price is Jurassic Park Ultimate Trilogy (Blu-ray + Digital Copy).
Very good movie yhat i would watch over and over

Great Action filled package. I saw all the movies in 2 days, I enjoyed seeing one of the great action movies hero in his best moments at his top condition. And although some of the plots have a dose on hard to believe secuences, all in all is a very enjoyable set of movies. I am glad I can also show this to my children when they turn 18 for a nice action film.

Can you believe 7 knuckleheads actually gave this mess of films 5 stars? Chuck's acting is much better now in his infomercials. Way back in the 1970s, grindhouse producers were fishing around for a white guy who could put a white face on chop-socky, and maybe steal some of Bruce Lee's righteous thunder.  Unfortunately, the white guy they settled on was Chuck. I hear Chuck coached Steve McQueen in karate, and a few other Hollywood notables as well. Somehow, two-buck Chuck ingratiated himself and kissed enough butt-crack to get a career going.  He then became multi-million buck Chuck. As Don King says: "Only in America!" The only one of these 5 films that is good for a laugh is Lone Wolf McQuade. At least, that has a bizarro David Carradine at his sleaziest throwing loopy crescent kicks, and grinning sadistically. Plus it has luscious Barbara Carrera.
I bought these for a co-worker who is a huge fan of Chuck Norris! He was thrilled with the videos and had a Chuck Norris marathon that weekend.

These blu-rays are region free which is good news for Chuck's European fans. The movie Braddock Missing In Action III  which has not been released in The U.S.A yet is available from Amazon's German site but it is region 2 locked.
For those Chuck Norris fans this is a must have set. Love them! Movies like this don't seem to be produced these days.

Is he a good actor - not really.  But if you enjoy any of his 'war/action' movies I'm sure you will enjoy this collection!!  My favorite is Lone Wolf McQuade - bot the MIA series is a good set of movies and I also enjoyed Code of Silence and Delta Force.  I probably wouldn't have paid more than the $25 I spent on these five movies, but if you can pick it up cheap (how can you beat $5 a movie on blu-ray?)  I would definitely pick it up if I was you.

Of course, it doesn't compare to the 'new' movies with all the special effects but then again, it's not supposed to as most of these movies were made around 30 years ago!!
Picture but no sound, returned the first set, and the second set had the same problem. No offer to replace with individual titles by Amazon. VERY unsatisfied.
It has been said the Chuck Norris' tears could cure cancer, if only he would cry or shed a tear!
